title: Trying to join a game, 1 player "Not Connected"
body: Start the game without them please, it is quite irritating having to wait 20 minutes for someone who has bad internet to start a game, it is really time consuming and i am playing less and lesser games everyday because half the time im waiting for people to connect to the servers. it is usually caused by a crash or disconnection from pvp.net so i know it is a glitch as it has happened to me (restarting the client seems to fix it) but please fix it....

replies.body: Now i get an error saying the game has crashed and my internet dc'd when it is connected. FIX THE ISSUE, ITS GIVING OUT FREE QUEUES
